DocFetcher is a free open-source desktop search application that allows users to search for contents within files on their computer instantly. It is a software tool that can help individuals with a lot of manual searching tasks—this tool can save effort and time. The software is built on the cross-platform framework and is available on multiple platforms including Windows, Linux, and macOS.

## Features

DocFetcher has a wide range of features that make it a favored choice in various work and personal contexts.

### Advanced search options

The software offers multiple search options to users, such as :

- Regular expressions
- Wildcard searches
- Exact phrase searches


### Supported file types

The software supports indexing the contents of various file types, including:

- Microsoft Word documents
- OpenDocument files
- PDF files
- HTML files
- RTF files
- Plain text files
- Epub files

### User-friendly interface

DocFetcher has an intuitive and user-friendly interface. Users can easily navigate around it and adjust settings to meet their requirements quickly.

### Portable editions

DocFetcher offers portable editions, making it possible for users to take the application with them wherever they go.

### Open source

Being an open-source program, it is entirely free to use, and users can customize and adjust the application to suit their individual needs.

## Installation

Downloading and installing DocFetcher is an easy process. Users can choose between executable files or installation packages.

### Windows

For Windows, users can download and install the application from the website. The downloaded files are in executable files format, and installation is a typical progress.

### Linux

On Linux, users can download relevant package installers according to their distribution. They will have to follow the standard installation process based on their distro.

### MacOS

MacOS Catalina supports DocFetcher through Homebrew or Macports. This tool is not available for earlier versions of macOS.

## How to Use DocFetcher

Using DocFetcher is easy, and it has an intuitive interface, making it accessible for everyone. Below is a step-by-step guide on how to use DocFetcher:

1. Start by running the DocFetcher application. 
2. To initiate a search, type what you are looking for in the “Query” field. 
3. From the “Search in” section, select the specific file type type to search in. 
4. After selecting the file type you want to search, click the "Start Search" button.
5. The results of the search will be displayed in the “Results” pane. 
6. Double-click on the file you want to open, and it will open on the default application for that file type.

## Conclusion

DocFetcher is an essential tool for individuals who want to simplify and speed up their searches. It has a wide range of features that make it more accessible and more versatile. DocFetcher is a valuable software solution for anyone who is looking for instant and quick search results within their computer files. This powerful desktop search application is open-source, intuitive, and easy to use, for a seamless search experience.
